page.title: 12LOCAL PEOPLE
page.content:
SHE HAS LIVED IN MARCHWIEL FOR 36 YEARS. SHE SAYS THE PEOPLE ARE VERY FRIENDLY. SHE DOES HER SHOPPING IN WREXHAM. THE ONLY TIME SHE GOES TO THE POST OFFICE IS FOR HER PENSION BECAUSE THE PAPERS ARE DELIVERED. MRS JONES SAYS THAT MARCHWIEL IS VERY TIDY.
GWEN DIGGITY HAS LIVED ON THE OUTSKIRTS OF MARCHWIEL ALL OF HER LIFE SO SHE DOES NOT KNOW THE VILLAGE MUCH. GWEN DOES HER SHOPPING IN WREXHAM. SHE FINDS PEOPLE VERY FRIENDLY. SHE NEVER GOES TO THE MOBILE SHOP OR ANY OTHER SHOPS IN MARCHWIEL TO DO HER SHOPPING. MOST PEOPLE HAVE COME TO LIVE HERE RECENTLY SO SHE DOES NOT KNOW MANY PEOPLE.
